description: Notification of an unavailable destination failure encountered
while transferring a collector file.

event.Summary: Destination $v5 is unavailable for transferring a collector file

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollUnavailableDest IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyDate s EXAMPLEE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyUrl s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInetType i 0 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInetAddress s EXAMPLE

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Provides the current system date and time.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyDate

description: The URL associated with a file transfer destination.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyUrl

description: Used with jnxCollNotifyInetAddress to identify a specific
file transfer destination.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInetType

description: Used with jnxCollNotifyInetType to identify a specific
file transfer destination.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInetAddress

description: This indicates a previous unavailable destination failure
has been resolved.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollUnavailableDestCleared IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyDate s EXAMPLEE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyUrl s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInetType i 0 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInetAddress s EXAMPLE

description: Provides the current system date and time.

description: The URL associated with a file transfer destination.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyUrl

description: Used with jnxCollNotifyInetAddress to identify a specific
file transfer destination.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInetType

description: Used with jnxCollNotifyInetType to identify a specific

variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInetAddress

description: This indicates an error was encountered while attempting
a file transfer.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollUnsuccessfulTransfer IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyDate s EXAMPLEE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFile s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyUrl s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInetType i 0 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInetAddress s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyError s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFtpResultCode i 9999 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFtpErrorText s EXAMPLE

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Provides the current system date and time.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyDate

description: Identifies a specific file for notifications that refer to a file.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFile

description: The URL associated with a file transfer destination.

description: Used with jnxCollNotifyInetAddress to identify a specific
file transfer destination.

description: Description of error encountered when trying to transfer a file.

description: Provides the FTP result code for file transfer notifications.

description: Provides the FTP error text for file transfer notifications.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFtpErrorText

description: This indicates a soft or hard flow overload condition has been
triggered.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollFlowOverload IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollPicIfStateChangeDate s EXAMPLEE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyOverloadType i 1 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyNewRecordRate u 9999 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollPicIfCreatedFiles C 9999 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollPicIfDestroyedFiles C 9999

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The system date and time when the management subsystem last
learned of a change to the value of jnxCollPicIfCurrentState
for this Collector PIC.

description: Identifies a specific type of flow overload condition
on this Collector PIC.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyOverloadType

description: Provides the current number of new records per second created
on this Collector PIC.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyNewRecordRate

description: The total number of files created by this Collector PIC
since the last time the PIC was reset.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollPicIfCreatedFiles

description: The total number of files destroyed by this Collector PIC.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollPicIfDestroyedFiles

description: This indicates a soft or hard flow overload condition has been
cleared.

event.Summary: $v3 alarm cleared on collector PIC; Interface: $v1

description: This indicates a memory unavailable condition has been
triggered.

event.Summary: Memory is unavailable; Current utilization: $v4; Free: $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollMemoryUnavailable IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollPicIfStateChangeDate s EXAMPLEE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyMemThresh u 9999 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyMemUtil u 9999 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyMemFree u 9999

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The system date and time when the management subsystem last
learned of a change to the value of jnxCollPicIfCurrentState
for this Collector PIC.

description: Provides the current memory threshold used for determining
memory unavailable conditions.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyMemThresh

description: Provides the current memory utilization for pic overload
notifications.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyMemUtil

description: Provides the current amount of free memory for pic overload
notifications.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyMemFree

description: This indicates a memory unavailable condition has been
cleared.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollMemoryAvailable IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollPicIfStateChangeDate s EXAMPLEE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyMemThresh u 9999 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyMemUtil u 9999 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyMemFree u 9999

description: This indicates an FTP server switchover has occurred.

event.Summary: FTP server $v7 switched over to $v8 state

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollFtpSwitchover IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyDate s EXAMPLEE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFromFtpServerInetType i 0 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFromFtpServerInetAddress s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFromFtpServerType i 1 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyToFtpServerInetType i 0 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyToFtpServerInetAddress s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyToFtpServerType i 1 JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInitiatedBy i 1

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Provides the current system date and time.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyDate

description: Used with jnxCollNotifyFromFtpServerInetAddress to identify
a specific FTP server address.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFromFtpServerInetType

description: The FTP server address from which the switchover occurs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFromFtpServerInetAddress

description: The FTP server Type from which the switchover occurs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyFromFtpServerType

description: Used with jnxCollNotifyToFtpServerInetAddress to identify
a specific FTP server address.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyToFtpServerInetType

description: The FTP server address to which the switchover occurs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyToFtpServerInetAddress

description: The FTP server Type to which the switchover occurs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyToFtpServerType

description: Identify what initiates the FTP switchover.
variables.name: JUNIPER-COLLECTOR-MIB::jnxCollNotifyInitiatedBy
